TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedKeyEncryptingCredentials extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials

summary.span: 表示凭据加密的加密密钥。

span.span: Represents the encrypted key encrypting credentials.

summary.span: 它们通常用于像标记在数据加密的凭据加密。

span.span: These are usually used as data encrypting credentials to encrypt things like tokens.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The certificate used to encrypt the key.

summary.span: 使用指定的 X.509 证书初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包装凭据是 X.509 证书，并且你想要使用默认包装算法和加密算法，分别为 RSA-OAEP 和 AES256，请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor if the wrapping credential is an X.509 certificate and you want to use the default wrapping algorithm and encryption algorithm, which are RSA-OAEP and AES256 respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数，如果你已有对象，并且您想要将其用作包装凭据。Use this constructor if you already have an object and you want to use it as a wrapping credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包装凭据是 X.509 证书，并且你想要提供自己的换行算法和加密算法，请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor if the wrapping credential is an X.509 certificate and you want to supply your own wrapping algorithm and encryption algorithm.
